channel.title: Behance Network Featured Projects
channel.description: The latest projects featured on the Behance Network

item.title: Alfa Giulietta - Interactive Kiosk
item.description: I worked as art director and Interaction designer on this project for the launch of Alfa Romeo Giulietta. This is an interface for 220 Interactive totem all around Italy positioned in the Alfa Romeo dealers. All the interface is controlled by a knob trought Arduino. By the Knob rotation and pressure, users are able to browse and select all the contents. There are 2 different areas: / / The car configurator / / The discovery area The project was made in LBi Italy
item.content:encoded: I worked as art director and Interaction designer on this project for the launch of Alfa Romeo Giulietta. This is an interface for 220 Interactive totem all around Italy positioned in the Alfa Romeo dealers. All the interface is controlled by a knob trought Arduino. By the Knob rotation and pressure, users are able to browse and select all the contents. There are 2 different areas: / / The car configurator / / The discovery area The project was made in LBi Italy

item.title: "Les passants"
item.description: "les passants" is my sketchbook from a holiday in Provence. Walking through the streets of France, among the scents of spices and upbeat chirping of cicadas, it's fun to watch passers-by. Imagine how many lives

item.title: Images Festival 25
item.description: 2012 marked the 25th anniversary of the Images Festival, the largest festival in North America for experimental motion-based art. The studio was engaged to design all of the marketing collateral, including program guide, transit advertising, signage, t-shirts, passes and trailer. To celebrate the festivals many years of success while informed by the traditional film countdown, the visual identity features a distinct set of numerals we designed for use in both static print and kinetic motion applications.
item.content:encoded: 2012 marked the 25th anniversary of the Images Festival, the largest festival in North America for experimental motion-based art. The studio was engaged to design all of the marketing collateral, including program guide, transit advertising, signage, t-shirts, passes and trailer. To celebrate the festivals many years of success while informed by the traditional film countdown, the visual identity features a distinct set of numerals we designed for use in both static print and kinetic motion applications.

item.title: OPTILABS 2012 // Circles
item.description: SECOND OPTILABS NEW PROJECT RELEASED IN 2012. I've developed different series based on different geometric concepts, as waves, circles, cubes, and many other geometrical and abstract elements. This is about circles. OPTILABS is my personal path of development and creation of optical/abstract artworks that I carry on since 2006.
item.content:encoded: SECOND OPTILABS NEW PROJECT RELEASED IN 2012. I've developed different series based on different geometric concepts, as waves, circles, cubes, and many other geometrical and abstract elements. This is about circles. OPTILABS is my personal path of development and creation of optical/abstract artworks that I carry on since 2006.

item.title: Croatian Market Portfolio iPhone App
item.description: Croatian Market Portfolio is an iPhone app for the business people, stock traders and investors. The app is intended to fill the gap in the Croatian business mobile app market by providing instant, seamless and accurate information about Croatian Stock Market as well as being the mobile assistant in managing and overviewing personal stock portfolio. The app is currently in design phase and the release date is set in second quarter 2013. Until then, enjoy these few screenshots. Hope youll like it :)
item.content:encoded: Croatian Market Portfolio is an iPhone app for the business people, stock traders and investors. The app is intended to fill the gap in the Croatian business mobile app market by providing instant, seamless and accurate information about Croatian Stock Market as well as being the mobile assistant in managing and overviewing personal stock portfolio. The app is currently in design phase and the release date is set in second quarter 2013. Until then, enjoy these few screenshots. Hope youll like it :)

item.title: Sailthru
item.description: Founded in 2009, Sailthru set out to change the face of B2C digital communication through proprietary technology that allows their clients to tailor communication to each individual user. In order to convey the unique benefits of their product, they needed a brand identity that positioned them as a thought leader with a forward-thinking and revolutionary product in an increasingly crowded category. So inspired by the idea of interaction, accessibility, and delivery, we created an approachable typeface and activated the 'T' in Sailthru to convey a sense of purpose and momentum. We then applied the concept of crisp, clear and efficient communication to their site design. We also created straightforward, conversational messaging to rise above the white noise of the category.
item.content:encoded: Founded in 2009, Sailthru set out to change the face of B2C digital communication through proprietary technology that allows their clients to tailor communication to each individual user. In order to convey the unique benefits of their product, they needed a brand identity that positioned them as a thought leader with a forward-thinking and revolutionary product in an increasingly crowded category. So inspired by the idea of interaction, accessibility, and delivery, we created an approachable typeface and activated the 'T' in Sailthru to convey a sense of purpose and momentum. We then applied the concept of crisp, clear and efficient communication to their site design. We also created straightforward, conversational messaging to rise above the white noise of the category.

item.title: SUBSTANCE
item.description: SUBSTANCE "In terms of sentiments, the lack of logic is the best evidence of sincerity" Tolstoï The SUBSTANCE is a synthetic body composed of a single material (of which the composition is unknown) and a random physical reality. We are not equipped with enough information about its manufacturing process and polymerization in order to understand its origins; its seems to us, however, that it is a new state of matter (solid, liquid, gas, or plasma), one of a kind of sensitivity. The SUBSTANCE can be found in several stages by a single contradictory factor, the Human Being. Its evolution is based on any quantifiable or predictable criteria; it may cause the accident as much as it can avoid it. Its phases of transition are instantaneous, and it reacts to any environmental factor. Its instability does not permit a safe utility, nor does it allow a controlled and deliberate manipulation. The SUBSTANCE has no recordable property.
item.content:encoded: SUBSTANCE "In terms of sentiments, the lack of logic is the best evidence of sincerity" Tolstoï The SUBSTANCE is a synthetic body composed of a single material (of which the composition is unknown) and a random physical reality. We are not equipped with enough information about its manufacturing process and polymerization in order to understand its origins; its seems to us, however, that it is a new state of matter (solid, liquid, gas, or plasma), one of a kind of sensitivity. The SUBSTANCE can be found in several stages by a single contradictory factor, the Human Being. Its evolution is based on any quantifiable or predictable criteria; it may cause the accident as much as it can avoid it. Its phases of transition are instantaneous, and it reacts to any environmental factor. Its instability does not permit a safe utility, nor does it allow a controlled and deliberate manipulation. The SUBSTANCE has no recordable property.

item.title: Scotland Monkeys
item.description: We displayed the maxim "Everybody always thinks they are right" in the Scottish cities of Glasgow, Aberdeen, Edinburgh, Inverness, Dundee, and Stirling. Commissioned by the Scottish government initiated Six Cities Design Festival, a total of six 33-foot (10-meter) white and angry monkeys were placed, in various positions, on eminent locations smack in the center of each of these cities. Illustrated by Monika Aichele in Germany and built by Sportogo in California, each monkey held a banner containing one word of the sentence, the whole sentiment only completed for a viewer visiting all cities, or through the media.
item.content:encoded: We displayed the maxim "Everybody always thinks they are right" in the Scottish cities of Glasgow, Aberdeen, Edinburgh, Inverness, Dundee, and Stirling. Commissioned by the Scottish government initiated Six Cities Design Festival, a total of six 33-foot (10-meter) white and angry monkeys were placed, in various positions, on eminent locations smack in the center of each of these cities. Illustrated by Monika Aichele in Germany and built by Sportogo in California, each monkey held a banner containing one word of the sentence, the whole sentiment only completed for a viewer visiting all cities, or through the media.

item.title: The Bricks - UI Framework
item.description: The Bricks is a Free set of User Interface components designed to facilitate the creation of design or prototype for the future website. This package will help you save your time in the process of development of components, and will become an excellent basis for creating website from design to code. Dont waste your time drawing numerous shapes, when they are already included in this package. Just drag the component, change its style and use it. It is simple, fast and beautiful.
item.content:encoded: The Bricks is a Free set of User Interface components designed to facilitate the creation of design or prototype for the future website. This package will help you save your time in the process of development of components, and will become an excellent basis for creating website from design to code. Dont waste your time drawing numerous shapes, when they are already included in this package. Just drag the component, change its style and use it. It is simple, fast and beautiful.

item.title: LING MAGAZINE ISSUE 12 ILLUSTRATION
item.description: Ling Magazine's type illustration. THE CITY THAT LIGHTS UP WITH ITS RESIDENTS FOOTSTEPS Toulouse, known as the pink city because of the colour of its buildings at sunset, will now shine even brighter thanks to its residents footsteps: the energy they produce by strolling around their city will power the street lamps along the way. And all thanks to technology which first came to light on a nightclub dance floor.
item.content:encoded: Ling Magazine's type illustration. THE CITY THAT LIGHTS UP WITH ITS RESIDENTS FOOTSTEPS Toulouse, known as the pink city because of the colour of its buildings at sunset, will now shine even brighter thanks to its residents footsteps: the energy they produce by strolling around their city will power the street lamps along the way. And all thanks to technology which first came to light on a nightclub dance floor.

item.title: IPG Media Economy Report
item.description: Editorial- and Information-Design for the first Media Economy Report for IPG Mediabrands and their strategic global media unit MagnaGlobal. Informed by the global resources of IPG MEDIABRANDS, this inaugural Media Economy Report contains an overview of the forces influencing value in the media marketplace, Q&As with three industry leaders, and Magnas point of view on how advertising stakeholders in the media value chainmedia owners, agencies, and advertiserscan leverage market disruptions to achieve the greatest possible value.
item.content:encoded: Editorial- and Information-Design for the first Media Economy Report for IPG Mediabrands and their strategic global media unit MagnaGlobal. Informed by the global resources of IPG MEDIABRANDS, this inaugural Media Economy Report contains an overview of the forces influencing value in the media marketplace, Q&As with three industry leaders, and Magnas point of view on how advertising stakeholders in the media value chainmedia owners, agencies, and advertiserscan leverage market disruptions to achieve the greatest possible value.
